Articles.Content:
Recently I installed 2 mods, the official asteroid day mod, and KER.

Now it seems my game runs much slower while in the atmosphere.

I don't play with heavy mods, these are the only two aside from simple mods I've done myself (a few parts using the old models from .18).

I think KER is slowing it down... but could it really be that resource intensive?

200 part craft are now too big to fly for me

I think KER is slowing it down... but could it really be that resource intensive?

KER will cause a loss of performance when you have windows open but it shouldn't be very significant. I suggest you carefully test the difference by simply removing KER and seeing if it changes. If you do get a significant performance drop then I suggest posting your craft file (and possibly the whole save game) in the KER thread.
KER can hurt performance. It's usually fine, but if you have very complicated staging there might be issues when you have the VESL page open.
